Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.

Maria Bvtt husbond of oo thyng I pray ?ow most mekely I haue knowyng Ã¾at oure Cosyn Elizabeth with childe is Ã¾at it plese ?ow to go to here hastyly If owught we myth comforte here it wore to me blys. Joseph A godys sake is she with childe sche than wole here husbond zakarye be mery In Montana they dwelle fer hens so moty the In Ã¾e cety of juda I knowe it veryly It is hens I trowe myles two and ffyfty We are lyke to be wery or we come at Ã¾at same I wole with a good wyl blyssyd wyff mary now go we forthe than in goddys name. Maria Goth husbond Ã¾ow it be to ?ow peyne this jurny I pray ?ow lete us go fast ffor I am schamfast of Ã¾e pepyl to be seyne and namely of men Ã¾er of I am A-gast Pylgrymagys and helpyngys wolde be go in hast Ã¾e more Ã¾e body is peynyd Ã¾e more is Ã¾e mede Say ?e ?our devocionys and I xal myn I cast(?) now in Ã¾is jurny god mote us spede. Joseph Amen Amen and evyr more lo wyff lo how starkly I go be-fore. et sic transient circa placeam. Comtemplacio Sovereynes vndyrstondyth Ã¾at kynge davyd here Ordeyned ffoure and twenty prestys of grett devocion In Ã¾e temple of god Aftere here let apere Ã¾ei weryd clepyd summi sacerdotes ffor here mynistracion And on was prynce of prestys havynge dominacyon A-monge whiche was An old prest clepyd zakarye and he had An old woman to his wyff of holy conversacion whiche hyth Elizabeth Ã¾at nevyr had childe verylye. In hese mynistracion the howre of incense the Aungel Gabryel Apperyd hym to Ã¾at hese wyff xulde conseyve he ?aff hym intelligence hese juge hese vnwurthynes and Age not be-levyd so The plage of dompnesse hise lippis lappyd lo thei wenten hom and his wyff was conseyvenge this concepcion gabryel tolde oure lady to and in soth sone Aftere Ã¾at sage sche was sekynge And of here tweyners metyng here gynnyth Ã¾e proces now god be oure be-gynnynge and of my tonge I wole ses. Joseph A A Wyff Infeyth I am wery therfore I wole sytt downe and rest me ryght here lo Wyff here is Ã¾e hous of zakary Wole ?e I clepe Elyzabeth to ?ow to A-pere. Maria Nay husbond And it plese ?ow I xal go ner now Ã¾e blyssyd trynite be in Ã¾is hous A cosyn Elizabeth swete modyr what cher ?e grow grett A my god how ?e be gracyous. Elizabeth A-non as I herd of ?ow Ã¾is holy gretynge mekest mayden and Ã¾e modyr of god mary be ?our breth Ã¾e holy gost vs was inspyrynge Ã¾at Ã¾e childe in my body enjoyd gretly And turnyd down on his knes to oure god reverently whom ?e bere in ?our body Ã¾is veryly I ken ffulfyllyd with Ã¾e holy gost Ã¾us lowde I cry blyssyd be Ã¾ou A-monge All women. And blyssyd be Ã¾e frute of Ã¾i wombe also Ã¾ou wurthyest virgyne and wyff Ã¾at evyr was wrought how is it Ã¾at Ã¾e modyr of god me xulde come to Ã¾at wrecche of all wrecchis A whyght wers Ã¾an nought And Ã¾ou art blyssyd Ã¾at be-levyd veryly in Ã¾i thought Ã¾at Ã¾e wurde of god xulde profyte in the but how Ã¾is blyssydnes A-bought was brought I can not thynk nyn say how it myght be. Maria To Ã¾e preysynge of god cosyn this seyd mut be whan I sat in my lytyl hous on to god praynge Gabryel come and seyde to me Ave ther I conceyvyd god At my consentynge Parfyte god and parfyte man At onys beynge than Ã¾e Aungel seyd on to me Ã¾at it was sex monethys syn ?our conseyvynge Ãis cawsyth my comynge cosyn ?ow to comforte and se. Elizabeth Blyssyd be ?e cosyn ffor ?our hedyr comynge How I conseyvyd I xal to ?ow say Ã¾e Aungel Apperyd Ã¾e howre of incensynge Seynge I xulde conseyve and hym thought nay Sethe ffor his mystrost he hath be dowm Al-way and Ã¾us of my concepcion I haue tolde ?ow sum. Maria ffor Ã¾is holy psalme I be-gynne here Ã¾is day. Magnificat,' anima mea dominum Et exultauit spiritus meus in deo salutari meo. Elizabeth Be Ã¾e holy gost with joye goddys son is in Ã¾e cum Ã¾at Ã¾i spyryte so injouyid Ã¾e helth of Ã¾i god so. Maria Quia respexit humilitatem ancille sue ecce enim ex hoc beatam me dicent omnes generaciones. Elizabeth Ffor he be-held Ã¾e lownes of hese hand-mayde?e so ferforthe ffor Ã¾at All generacionys blysse ?ow in pes. Maria Quia fecit mihi magna qui potens est et sanctum nomen eius. Elizabeth Ffor grett thyngys he made and also myghtyest And ryght holy is Ã¾e name of hym in vs. Maria Et misericordia eius a progenie in progenies timentibus eum. Elizabeth ?a Ã¾e mercy of hym fro Ã¾at kynde in to Ã¾e kynde of pes Ffor all Ã¾at hym drede now is he cum. Maria Fecit potenciam in brachio suo disspersit superbos mente cordis sui. Elizabeth The pore in his ryght Arme he hath mad so Ã¾e prowde to dyspeyre And Ã¾e thought of here hertys only. Maria Deposuit potentes de sede et exaltauit humiles. Elizabeth The prowde men fro hey setys put he And Ã¾e lowly vpon heyth in Ã¾e sete of pes. Maria Esurientes impleuit bonis et diuites dimisit inanes. Elizabeth Alle Ã¾e pore and Ã¾e nedy he fulfyllyth with his goodys And Ã¾e Ryche he fellyth to voydnes. Maria Suscepit israel puerum suum recordatus est misericordie sue. Elizabeth Israel ffor his childe vp-toke he to cum On his mercy to thynk ffor hese Ã¾at be. Maria Sicut locutus est ad patres nostros abraham et semini eius in secula. Elizabeth As he spak here to oure forfaderys in clos Abraham and to All hese sed of hym in Ã¾is werd sa. Maria Gloria patri et filio et spiritui sancto. Elizabeth Preysyng be to Ã¾e fadyr in hevyn lo Ã¾e same to Ã¾e son here be so Ã¾e holy gost Also to ken Maria Sicut erat in principio et nunc et semper et in secula seculorum amen. Elizabeth As it was in Ã¾e begynnynge and now is and xal be forevyr and in this werd in all good werkys to abydyn then. Maria This psalme of prophesye seyd be-twen vs tweyn In hefne it is wretyn with Aungellys hond evyr to be songe and Also to be seyn Euery day Amonge us at oure eve song. but cosyn Elyzabeth I xal ?ow here kepe and Ã¾is thre monethis Abyde here now tyl ?e han childe to wasche skore and swepe and in all Ã¾at I may to comforte ?ow. Elizabeth A ?e modyr of god ?e shewe us here how we xulde be meke Ã¾at wrecchis here be All hefne and herthe wurcheppe ?ow mow Ã¾at are trone and tabernakyl of Ã¾e hy? trinite. Joseph A how do ?e how do ?e ffadyr zacharye we ffalle ffast in Age with-owte oth why shake ?e so ?our hed haue ?e Ã¾e palsye Why speke ?e not sere I trowe ?e are not wroth. Elizabeth Nay wys ffadyr joseph Ã¾er to he were ful loth it is Ã¾e vesytacion of god he may not speke veryly lete us thank god Ã¾erffor both he xal remedy it whan it plesyth his mercy. Joseph Of ?our dissese thynkys no greff thank god of al aduersyte Ffor he wyl chastyse and repreff Ã¾o Ã¾at he lovyth most hertyle Mary I hold best Ã¾at we go hens we haue fer hom with-owt fayl. Maria Al redy husbond with-out defens I wyl werke be ?our counsayl Cosyn be ?our leve and ?our lycens for homward now us must travayl of Ã¾is refreschynge in ?our presens god ?eld ?ow Ã¾at most may Avayl. Elizabeth Now cosynes bothe god ?ow spede and wete ?ow wele with-owtyn mo ?our presens comfortyth me in dede and Ã¾er fore now am I ryght wo That ?e my ffrendys and my kynrede Ã¾us sone now xul parte me fro but I pray god he mote ?ow lede in every place wher so ?e go. here mary and elizabet partyn and elizabeth goth to zakarie and seyth Good husbond ryse up I be-seke ?ow and go we to Ã¾e temple now fast to wurchep god with Ã¾at we mow and thank hym bothe this is my cast Of Ã¾e tyme Ã¾at is comynge now ffor now is cum mercy and venjauns is past God wyl be born for mannys prow to brynge us to blysse Ã¾at euer xal last. Contemplacio lystenyth sovereynys here is conclusyon how Ã¾e Aue was mad here is lernyd vs Ã¾e Aungel seyd Ave gratia plena dominus tecum benedicta tu in mulieribus Elizabeth seyd et benedictus fructus uentris tui thus Ã¾e chirch addyd Maria And Jhesus her who seyth oure ladyes sawtere dayly ffor A ?er Ã¾us he hath pardon ten thousand And eyte hundryd ?er. Than ferther to oure matere for to procede Mary with elizabeth abod Ã¾er stylle iij monthys fully as we rede thankynge god with hertly wylle A lord god what hous was Ã¾is on Ã¾at Ã¾ese childeryn and here moderys to as mary and elizabeth jhesus and john and joseph and zakarye Also. And evyr oure lady a-bod stylle Ã¾us tyl johan was of his modyr born and Ã¾an zakarye spak i-wus Ã¾at had be down and his spech lorn he and Elizabeth prophesyed as Ã¾us they mad Benedictus them be-forn and so Magnificat And Benedictus ffyrst in Ã¾at place Ã¾er made worn. Whan all was don oure lady fre toke here leve than aftere this At Elizabeth and at zakarie And kyssyd johan and gan hym blys Now most mekely we thank ?ou of ?our pacyens and beseke ?ou of ?our good supportacion If here hath be seyd ore don Any inconuenyens we Asygne it to ?our good deliberacion Be-sekynge to crystys precious passyon conserve and rewarde ?our hedyr comynge with Aue we be-gunne and Aue is oure conclusyon Ave regina celorum to oure lady we synge.
